### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and multiple pipe groups connecting them.

### Furnace group at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 50}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=52.0, y=-84.0))
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 46}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=52.0, y=-82.0))
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 46}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=52.0, y=-80.0))
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 19}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=62.0, y=-54.0))

### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of Lab(lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 50}, status=EntityStatus.NO_POWER, research=automation, electrical_id=2231)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing pipes near water
- Ensure the target position for the pipe does not overlap with water before attempting to place it.
### Errors when placing pipes too far away
- Make sure to move closer to the target position before attempting to place the pipe, as the max distance to place an entity is 10 units.
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and the connection points are correctly aligned before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is correctly connected to the steam engine and the fluid system is properly set up.
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine is correctly connected to the power network and has a valid input liquid.
